targets.rawSql:
SELECT sleep_debt_ms
FROM whoop_sleep
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;
SELECT c.timestamp AS "time", c.strain, r.recovery_score FROM whoop_cycle c JOIN whoop_recovery r ON c.id = r.cycle_id WHERE $__timeFilter(c.timestamp) ORDER BY c.timestamp;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  total_rem_sleep_ms,
  total_awake_ms,
  total_slow_wave_sleep_ms,
  total_light_sleep_ms,
  (total_rem_sleep_ms + total_slow_wave_sleep_ms + total_light_sleep_ms + total_awake_ms) AS duration_ms
FROM whoop_sleep
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and nap = 'False'
ORDER BY timestamp;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  total_rem_sleep_ms,
  total_awake_ms,
  total_slow_wave_sleep_ms,
  total_light_sleep_ms,
  (total_rem_sleep_ms + total_slow_wave_sleep_ms + total_light_sleep_ms + total_awake_ms) AS duration_ms
FROM whoop_sleep
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and nap = 'True'
ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT timestamp AS "time", hrv_rmssd_ms, resting_heart_rate FROM whoop_recovery WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) ORDER BY timestamp;

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS workout_count
FROM whoop_workout 
WHERE $__timeFilter(start);

SELECT SUM(zone_zero_milli) as zero, SUM(zone_one_milli) as one, SUM(zone_two_milli) as two, SUM(zone_three_milli) as three, SUM(zone_four_milli) as four, SUM(zone_five_milli) as five
FROM whoop_workout
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)

SELECT timestamp, SUM(zone_zero_milli) as zero, SUM(zone_one_milli) as one, SUM(zone_two_milli) as two, SUM(zone_three_milli) as three, SUM(zone_four_milli) as four, SUM(zone_five_milli) as five
FROM whoop_workout
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) 
GROUP BY timestamp
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
